description.@en: You have peered towards the skies in hope of answers, both earthly and sorcerous. In that, the mysteries of the zodiac reveal their terrible truths.

effect.@en: You automatically gain all of the following Focuses in the Incantation Skill whenever you enter this Profession: Astrology, Card Reading, Dream Interpretation, Hypnotize, Palmistry, Scapulimancy and Scrying. You also understand how to use the Ritual of Magick Circle.
